 seed file (7M urls) will not load

One simple thing I've done is move the seedlist file
from the job directory to something else, and put in a one
site seed list.

After all, by now, the whole list is in the frontier, so you kind
of don't need it anymore.

Try that.

John

Steven Webb wrote:

>
>
> I'm running a job seeded with 7M urls. It ran to about 25% completion, 
> then died. I'm now trying to restart the job (new job based on 
> recovery-log), but the web GUI is loading the seed list into the 
> browser and it's taking forever (hours) and my browser's probably 
> going to crash. How can I do this via the command-line or just restart 
> the old job? I really don't want to start this over from scratch.
>
>
